title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering for NeuroplasticityEnhancer System
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and functional and non-functional requirements, including user stories, wireframes, and technical specifications for the NeuroplasticityEnhancer system. This will provide a solid foundation for the project's development. The focus should also be on gathering requirements that address the needs of users with brain injuries to ensure effective recovery. To facilitate better collaboration, consider adding a section for stakeholder feedback and incorporating their insights during the planning process.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, neuroplasticity exercises, and progress tracking.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side components, including APIs, data processing, and integration with third-party services.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and experience for the NeuroplasticityEnhancer system.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations (e.g., data privacy).

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipelines for the NeuroplasticityEnhancer system.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API references, and system architecture diagrams.
